pros: The administration is very caring and open to feedback from their employees.  They have created a family-like atmosphere and show true caring about their employees.  They are constantly  improving the quality and content of their educational course work with the latest research and technology.  I love working with them.  They respect my opinion and I feel like I am heard, as they do follow through with recommendations and suggestions.
cons: I really cannot think  of anything that is a con working with this university
